title: Dimension Document
description: A Minecraft Bedrock Edition dimension definition document. Dimensions define custom world spaces with configurable bounds and world generation settings. Custom dimensions can have their own terrain generation, height limits, and properties.

fields.title: Format Version
fields.description: The format version of this dimension file. Use '1.20.0' or later.

fields.title: Dimension Type
fields.description: The dimension type definition containing description and components.

fields.title: Identifier
fields.description: The unique identifier for this dimension, e.g., 'custom:my_dimension'.

fields.title: Components
fields.description: Components that define the dimension's properties.
